title: How Many Calories in a Bud Light?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Bud Light (12 oz serving), plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Bud Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle of Bud Light lager beer, unopened, chilled; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and temperature; alcohol content affects values. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Bud Light has ~110 kcal and 6.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Bud Light bottle?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal per standard 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Bud Light?
faqs.a: Roughly 6.6 g total carbs per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Bud Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: ~1.1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare to regular beer calories?
faqs.a: Lower at 110 kcal vs. ~145 kcal for many regular beers per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Bud Light?
faqs.a: Low: only 10 mg per 12 oz bottle.
